org.dyn4j.geometry.hull

Class GiftWrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.geometry.hull.GiftWrap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HullGenerator

    public class GiftWrap
extends java.lang.Object
implements HullGenerator
    Implementation of the Gift Wrapping convex hull algorithm.

    This implementation is not sensitive to colinear points and returns only the points of the convex hull.

    This algorithm is O(nh) worst case where n is the number of points and h is the number of sides in the convex hull.

    If the input point array has a size of 1 or 2 the input point array is returned.

    Since:
    2.2.0
    Version:
    2.2.3
    Author:
    William Bittle

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public Vector2[] generate(Vector2... points)
        Description copied from interface: HullGenerator
        Returns the points of the convex hull generated from the given point set.

        The resulting point set may not have the correct winding. Use the Geometry.getWinding(Vector2...) and Geometry.reverseWinding(Vector2...) methods to get and set the winding direction.

        Specified by:
        generate in interface HullGenerator
        Parameters:
        points - the point set
        Returns:
        Vector2[] the convex hull vertices
